model.structures

Class BasicSocietyModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.structures.BasicSocietyModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SocietyModel, StateModel

    public class BasicSocietyModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements SocietyModel
    This class implements a basic society model of the PPAL logic.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      BasicSocietyModel(StateModel stateModel)
      Constructs a basic society model out of a state model.
